amendment.description: Page 8, line 23, after the dollar amount insert the following: "(reduced by $100,000) (increased by $100,000)".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Suozzi amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 211 (Roll no. 430).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Suozzi amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 211 (Roll no. 430).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Suozzi.
